text: LRD can stand for: *The Labour Research Department, a United Kingdom trade union based research organisation *The ISO 4217 code for the Liberian dollar *Les Rallizes Dénudés *Les Rythmes Digitales *The IATA airport code for Laredo International Airport *Long-range dependency * Low Risk Distributor *Little Red Dot *The MTR station code for Light Rail Depot stop
title: LRD
